download.title: Download Your QQQ App
download.description: Search ‘QQQ Tokens‘ form Apple Store or Google Play. Or you can click the Badge link below. 👇🏼
link.title: Scan QRCode
link.description: Log in to QQQ app using your account to add your QLauncher to the App. ✨
gain.title: Gain The QQQ With Us
gain.description: Added successfully!  Get started to earn your QLauncher mining income now! 🤙🏼
